author: tielenaar
title: Endless fun
review:
My kid is very happy with this set. Catching the thief, putting it in the prison, using handcuffs, stealing the cash from the safe and flying around with the helicopter while chasing the quad and grabbing it with the hook.

Possibilities are endless, and it's very easy to build.

The helicopter itself is very easy to build, nice for beginning Lego enthusiasts. It's a big blue piece for the hull and a big piece for the landing skis, the rest are smaller parts which you put on easily.
